list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a form of play or sport, especially a competitive one played according to rules and decided by skill, strength, or luck.
a complete episode or period of play, ending in a definite result.
a type of activity or business regarded as a game.
wild mammals or birds hunted for sport or food.
eager or willing to do something new or challenging.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: they were game for anything after the traumas of Monday
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Họ là trò chơi cho bất cứ điều gì sau chấn thương thứ hai

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of a person's leg) permanently injured or disabled.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: his game leg was playing him up
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Chân trò chơi của anh ấy đã chơi anh ấy

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: manipulate (a situation), typically in a way that is unfair or unscrupulous.

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the majority of the audience are teens who game and watch anime
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Phần lớn khán giả là thanh thiếu niên trò chơi và xem phim hoạt hình

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: play games of chance for money; gamble.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: other Russians gamed at the tables in Monte Carlo
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Những người Nga khác được chơi game tại bàn ở Monte Carlo
